original_title: Oo Fifi, Five Days In Claude Monet's Garden, Part 2
overview: Here, Thater took three projectors, each one projecting only one color (red, green or blue) and reconstructed the image. The footage was the same as Oo Fifi Part I, but the result was an installation that accomplished its inverse. Instead of separating the projection into three component parts, Thater used three projectors to create a single composite image, thereby forming an analog approximation of a digital projection.
title: Oo Fifi, Five Days In Claude Monet's Garden, Part 2
